name: Jumping Wizard
description:
Before you play

-If you decide to play the game in browser instead of downloading it, please play it on fullscreen. You won't be able to see some text fully if you don't play on fullscreen.

-If your volume is high, please lower it down as the music turned out to be louder than we wanted to.

-There is no pause menu and buttton.

-To restart a level you can press the R key.

Game Info

Made by NeoPlayzGames and TheShyDragon.

This game is totally a top down plataformer! Yep! Totally!

This was made for the BenBonk Game Jam for 2020.

Credits

-Coding, start/end screen and levels structure by NeoPlayzGames
-Music and art by TheShyDragon
-Wizard sprites (except rolling and falling) by https://route1rodent.itch.io/ (https://route1rodent.itch.io/16x16-rpg-character-sprite-sheet)
-Levels background: https://steamcommunity.com/market/listings/753/286300-Futuristic%20Background

-Sound effects by https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9hBHt317mw, https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack and https://obsydianx.itch.io/interface-sfx-pack-1
